title: LibreBoot & GNU Boot Drama Is Deeper Than Expected
description:
Recently I did a video on some drama between Libreboot and GNU Boot, but afterwards both Leah Rowe of Libreboot and Noex of Gnu Boot got in contact with me to provide additional context on the situation
